nodes.text: Matlo was an Imperial worker who operated out of the Warren, an Imperial Research Facility on the planet Dantooine during the time of the Galactic Civil War.

Matlo was first mentioned in the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies: An Empire Divided, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
